original_text: People will love only themselves, and they will want lots of money for themselves. They will be proud and they will say how great they are. They will insult other people. They will not obey their parents. They will not thank anyone who helps them. They will not respect anything that is good. Timothy 2 Timothy 4
korean_text: 사람들이 자기를 사랑하며 돈을 사랑하며 자랑하며 교만하며 비방하며 부모를 거역하며 감사하지 아니하며 거룩하지 아니하며

sentences.original_text: and they will want lots of money for themselves
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 자신을 위해 많은 돈을 원할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and they will say how great they are
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 자신들이 얼마나 위대한지 말할 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will not obey their parents
They will not thank anyone who helps them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자신을 도와주는 사람에게 감사하지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They will not respect anything that is good
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 좋은 것을 존중하지 않을 것입니다
